name: Hummus And Carrot Sticks Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: chickpeas, olive oil, lemon, garlic, ground cumin, kosher salt, medium carrot
recipeInstructionSteps: Combine the chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, cumin, and salt in a blender or food processor and blend until completely smooth.
Transfer to an airtight container and store in the fridge up to 7 days.
Peel and cut the carrots into spears.
Serve with ⅓ cup (80 g) hummus.
